sys_element_mapping.value: due_date={{fd_transform:74c2399b-5c34-4c28-b995-99b21370d265}}^short_description=Create My First Objective^state=To-Do^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.student}}^description=I will create my first objective in my personal development plan and add a task to it.

sys_variable_value.value: Welcome to Your Personal Development Plan

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name,

 

You've been added to the Academy's Student group. As such, we ask that you create at least one objective and some tasks connected to that objective to expand your learning throughout your journey in the academy.

You can find your Objectives here, and your tasks (once you've created them) here.

To learn how to use your Personal Development Planner, check out the PDP section in the knowledge base.

We wish you the best of luck at the academy!

 

Kind Regards,
The Resourcing Team

sys_element_mapping.value: due_date={{fd_transform:74c2399b-5c34-4c28-b995-99b21370d265}}^short_description=Create My First Objective^state=To-Do^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.student}}^description=I will create my first objective in my personal development plan and add a task to it.

sys_variable_value.value: Welcome to Your Personal Development Plan

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name,

 

You've been added to the Academy's Student group. As such, we ask that you create at least one objective and some tasks connected to that objective to expand your learning throughout your journey in the academy.

You can find your Objectives here, and your tasks (once you've created them) here.

To learn how to use your Personal Development Planner, check out the PDP section in the knowledge base.

We wish you the best of luck at the academy!

 

Kind Regards,
The Resourcing Team
